name: Slimy Walls
description:
Slimy Walls is a short 2D platformer and was made for the weekly game jam 177, the theme was "stikky".

the game has 3 level, each one getter harder.

at the end of each level you will you see your score, share the total score you had at the end of the third level with me in the comments, i'd like to see how well you all did.

the controls;

wasd or arrow keys to move

space to jump

s or down arrow and then space to long jump

r to reset the level
